biotools.summary:
An optimized ATAC-seq pipeline with serial alignments.

PEPATAC is a pipeline designed to process ATAC-seq data. For more information see: http://pepatac.databio.org/.

PEPATAC is an ATAC-seq pipeline. It trims adapters, maps reads, calls peaks, and creates bigwig tracks, TSS enrichment files, and other outputs. It is optimized on unique features of ATAC-seq data to be fast and accurate and provides several unique analytical approaches.

An open structure and toolkit for organizing large-scale, sample-intensive biological research projects.

PEP, or Portable Encapsulated Projects, is a community effort to make sample metadata reusable. PEPs decouple metadata from analysis-
